reviewText: Correct product.  Arrived ahead of time.

I purchased this DVD to give a friend to use as her back drop for her Bridal shower in one week.
She wanted to view it before showing it at the party, but to our disappointment we only saw one penis during the entire play time and it was limp (never to become erect).
Bottom line the DVD was full of girl and boobs and men doing a lot of bumping and grinding.  Needless to say she didn't want to use it.
I wouldnt recommend this item to anyone.  And Im really pissed at myself for picking this X-rated DVD; this couldn't even be called soft porn.

After having viewed Playboy's Erotic Fantasies 2, I must say that I was a little disappointed in the original.

The scenes were all well executed, with the exception of the scene that begins in a pool hall and ends up in a backroom that happens to have a mattress on the floor.  I have no idea how the parts connected to each other.

In this video all the male models were very much into their roles, however, the Playmates were rather dis-engaged in my opinion.  It is the exact opposite in EF2, where the Playmates are very much into their scenes but the men are rather stiff, and not in the way you'd think!  And, in my opinion, the women of EF1 were not as attractive as the women of EF2.  Too many of the ladies had obvious boob jobs which is not really to my liking.

All in all the video was still fun to watch with my Wife and we got a good laugh out of it.  I highly recommend Playboy's Erotic Fantasies 2 but the original is still good if you are a fan of sexy softcore erotica!
No real action here.  There is a Loving Sex series that is way better.  Just some painted whores in outfits.
It was okay.  Don't really remember it, so i must not have been too impressed.
Not what we were expecting. I should have read the reviews better. This movie looked like it was produced a very long time ago and did not keep our interest

In the older Playboy tradition of beautiful and tasteful erotica set in enticing fantasy settings. Something to enjoy as part of a fun night at home with your sweetie. Much more appealing, positive and life affirming than what is currently produced under the Playboy label. I would recommend buying the entire Erotic Fantasies series.
Not what I as expecting but I'll keep it anyway.

Interesting purchase. Bought this thinking it would be steamy and sexy in the bedroom. I was wrong. Its not my style. Very very gentle boring play. Watched once, haven't opened again. If you're into the beautiful gentle rose-petal romance- this is for you. If you're looking for girls gone wild, crazy kinky fun- look somewhere else. Its probably my own fault, I didn't know what I was looking for. Thank goodness for internet. Best of luck to you!
